Posts.Content: Hi everyone I am new to this board as we just found out my MOM's breat cancer has come back from 7 yrs being cancer free and this time she has to go for chemo. She has her 1st Dr's appt on Friday with medical oncologist and I wanted to ask those who have gone through this what questions she needs to ask to be prepared? Thanks SMS
Posts.Title: Mom going for chemo

Posts.Content: Thanks for the advice..I am on a couple of boards trying to gather as much info as possible. Every little bit helps Thanks Susanne
Posts.Title: Mom going for chemo

Posts.Content: Hi everyone I am posting this for my MOM She is 70 yrs old and had been in breast cancer remission for 7 yrs This past December her cancer is back. They put her on arimidex but when she got the blood work back it wasnt doing a thing. The tumors on her spine had grown. Now they are trying fulvestrant for 30 days and if that doesnt change anything they will have to do chemo Has anyone ever been in this boat and if so any advice? Thanks Susanne
Posts.Title: fulvestrant injection
